metadata.title: CVE-2021-47353 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: udf:Fix NULL pointer dereference in udf_symlink function In functionudf_symlink, epos.bh is assigned with the value returned by udf_tgetblk.The function udf_tgetblk is defined in udf/misc.c and returns the value ofsb_getblk function that could be NULL. Then, epos.bh is used without anycheck, causing a possible NULL pointer dereference when sb_getblk fails.This fix adds a check to validate the value of epos.bh.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
